levels.levelDescription: Descend into the dark-dirt pathways of the Serpentine Abyss, where deep-dark-holes lurk, ready to swallow the unwary into the depths of darkness.
Step into the mystical Enchanted Grove, where the pink-sand trails weave through shimmering pools of water, creating a serene yet treacherous landscape.
Enter the treacherous domain known as Shadows of Slytharis, navigating fractured-wall-platforms over rivers of molten lava as you confront the legendary sorcerer, Slytharis.
